title: Pelagos Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a large variety of vegan options including hummus and pita, large butter beans in tomato sauce, stuffed vine leaves, chickpea and courgette fritters. Located on the Greek island of Kos. Large seating space in a homey atmosphere.
